hackathon-description-text: Hack.UVA 2018 is all about diversity! We've got three tracks: Safety, Equality, and Empowerment.
hackathon-eligibility: Participants must be at least 18 years in age. Teams can have at most 4 people. To participate, you must be registered for Hack.UVA 2018 @

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will receive 2x Nintendo Switch, 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Phillip Hues Smart Home Kit, 2x GoPro Hero Session. The runner up team will receive 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Samsung Curved Monitor. All teams are eligible for the Safety track beginner prize of $400 if at least one member of the team is a beginner, where a beginner is defined a person who has never attended a hackathon before.

The winning team will receive 2x Nintendo Switch, 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Phillip Hues Smart Home Kit, 2x GoPro Hero Session. The runner up team will receive 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Samsung Curved Monitor. All teams are eligible for the Equality track beginner prize of $400 if at least one member of the team is a beginner, where a beginner is defined a person who has never attended a hackathon before.

The winning team will receive 2x Nintendo Switch, 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Phillip Hues Smart Home Kit, 2x GoPro Hero Session. The runner up team will receive 2x Bose® - QuietComfort® 35, 2x Samsung Curved Monitor. All teams are eligible for the Empowerment track beginner prize of $400 if at least one member of the team is a beginner, where a beginner is defined a person who has never attended a hackathon before.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Google Cloud Platform

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Sponsored by the Institute of Advanced Technology in the Humanities at UVA.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Visualisation of Diversity of Archival Networks

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Sponsored by Green IT. Winning team receives $500.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best Use of Machine Learning to Detect Sponsored Content (Leidos)

hackathon-description-header: A 24-hour hackathon to build, code, and innovate for diversity
hackathon-location-description: University of Virginia - Slaughter Recreation Center
